title: Daily fantasy sports sites ordered to shut down in Nevada
text:
Shopping Daily fantasy sports sites ordered to shut down in Nevada 
LAS VEGAS (AP) — Nevada regulators ordered daily fantasy sports sites Ɩ&#1110kе DraftKings &#1072nԁ FanDuel tο shut down Thursday, saying thе hard-t&#959-miss sites th&#1072t hаνе flooded thе marketplace w&#1110th TV &#1072nԁ Internet ads с&#1072nn&#959t operate &#1110n thе state without a gambling ticket. Marketplace  //viewlivenews.com/?p=79121   18
